turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, can you order a coffee mocha from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, that should be easy. which location do would you like me to pick it up from

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the starbucks located at 85 lance lane in calabasas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the store at lance lane does not have the coffee mocha

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: what's the other nearest location within 5 miles from my work office

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I believe the nearest one is at 256 lake ontario, calabasas about 3 miles from your offfice

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that's good. make an order of a coffe mocha for me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what size are you looking at - small medium or large

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I believe the small will be ok with extra whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the extra whipped cream will cost an extra $5

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thats fine. go ahead and make the order

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, I will order it and have it to you in the next 30 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you ask the to make a special effort and have it to me in 10 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that will cost another $5 for express delivery

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Don't you think this is costing too much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes but you really need the coffee drink quickly

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok. order it and put it on my credit card

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure will and I will pick up the small coffee mocha with extra whipped cream at 265 lake ontario, calabasas and get it to you in 10 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thanks you are a great help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: always at your service.
